scriptmodule.description:
Simulates the user hovering over the cart link. Opens the cart page by clicking on the 'View Cart' button on the minicart overlay.
Precondition: At least one product has been added to the cart.

command.name: mouseOver
command.comment: Hover over the mini cart link.

command.name: waitForElementPresent
command.comment: Wait for mini cart Window to appear.

command.name: mouseOver
command.comment: Hover over the mini cart window.
